11.content:
You are a huge fan of Total Drama and your favorite contestant is Bridgette, one day you get a chance to meet Bridgette in a hotel in L.A where she is staying. You worship Bridgette and to you she is a goddess, the moment you laid your eyes on her in the show you fell in love with her and would do anything to be with her.

Bridgette : Hey are you the guy who wants to me meet me
You : Um yeah .... Hi Ms.Bridgette
Bridgette : Hi, it's so nice to meet you
You : Really ?
Bridgette : Yeah it's always great to meet a fan, anyway you like my surfing suit

You momentarily gaze at her surfing suit from the shoe the black one with waves in the side and you start getting a boner
Bridgette : Um hey are you okay ?
You : Yeah, I ... I'm fine it's just that I'm so happy that I can finally meet you and I was hoping we could be friends .
Bridgette : Well you do seem like a nice guy ... Why don't we head to my room first okay
You : Okay

You followed Bridgette to her room this was your chance to finally become Bridgette's friend or maybe even more

Bridgette : It's a bit dirty so be careful where you step
You : Okay Miss Bridgette ... Can I ask you a question ... About your uh breakup with Geoff ?
Bridgette : Geoff's fine he was nice but he was too immature unlike you
You : Me ?
Bridgette : Yeah you, I've seen your social media accounts and from what I've learned you seem like a really nice kid just a really nice lonely kid
You : Well thank you and I was hoping we can
Bridgette : Kiss sure

Bridgette pulls you over and gives you a nice long passionate kiss and quickly you start to enjoy it

And then your head started spinning

Bridgette : Hey just a heads up I love and that's the reason I'm doing this lil guy

Bridgette : AWW LOOK AT YOU I DIDNT KNOW IF THIS WAS ACTUALLY GONNA WORK BUT I GUESS IT DID

When you wake up you were
11.title: you

114.content:
You wake up dizzy and you quickly realize that you have somehow shrunk to minuscule size your the size of a speck and as you look up you see Bridgette who was taller than you but only about an inch and to be fair you were a year younger but now she was a gargantuan beast the size of the tallest skyscraper and she looking down at you smiling.

Bridgette : UM HEY MAN WELL YOU'RE PROBABLY WONDERING WHY YOU'RE SO ITTY BITTY AND TINY BUT FIRST OF ALL LET ME GET THIS STRAIGHT, I LOVE YOU AND THATS WHY YOUR TINY SO YOU AND I CAN BE TOGETHER WITHOUT ALL THE ANNOYING PRESS AND THE LACK OF PRIVACY I MEAN THIS MUST BE A SHOCK BUT I HOPE YOU CAN UNDERSTAND

You stood there shaken you had no idea what just happened and now you know that Bridgette is the cause of all this, she lays down both of her hands signaling you to climb up

You : Bridgette what's gonna happen to me
Bridgette : DONT WORRY LIL GUY WE CAN BE THE PERFECT COUPLE AND YEAH I CAN GROW YOU BACK BUT ONLY I CAN DO IT AND I WONT TELL YOU HOW I CAN GROW YOU BACK YET
You : Bridgette I love you but how can I live at this size
Bridgette : DONT WORRY I'VE BOUGHT A LARGE HOUSE BY THE BEACH WHERE WE CAN LIVE TOGETHER AND I PROMISE I WILL TAKE GOOD CARE OF YOU
You : You realize you don't really have a choice since you're far from home and only Bridgette knows you've shrunk so you tell her you agree
Bridgette : GREAT LIL GUY NOW I'M SURE YOU'RE VERY TIRED SO WHY DONT YOU STAY ON MY
114.title: 1/4 inch tall

info.brief_description: You get shrunk by the surfer girl from total drama island
